description:
Edward IV`s death sparks a scramble for control of his young successor, with the Woodvilles are determined to eliminate Richard. Buckingham has the potential to decide the outcome in Richard`s favor, but fresh doubts threaten their alliance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Hide It, You Won`t Feel Sadness.
If You Hide It, You Won`t Feel Sadness.
If you hide it, you won`t feel sadness.
